Description ("The system shall..."): The system shall provide a usable workspace of at least 200 mm on the X-axis and 200 mm on the Y-axis.
The controller shall never command a position outside the range [0, 200] mm for both axes.
The system shall accept a binary input signal "System_ON".
If the "System_ON" signal is FALSE, the commanded velocity for both axes shall be forced to 0.
The system shall implement a state machine containing at least the following states: Idle, Drawing, and Error.
A transition from Idle to Drawing shall occur upon reception of the "Evt_Start" event.
In the Drawing mode, the system shall generate X(t) and Y(t) trajectories corresponding to the selected shape (Segment or Square).
Activation of the "Emergency_Stop" signal shall trigger an immediate transition to the Error state and stop all motor commands.
The system shall complete the tracing of a 100 x 100 mm square in less than 10 seconds.
The commanded acceleration shall not exceed 500 mm/sÂ² to prevent actuator saturation.
